description: Validates the supplied schema. This call has no side effects, it simply validates using the supplied schema using DataFormat as the format. Since it does not take a schema set name, no compatibility checks are performed.

parameters.name: DataFormat
parameters.description: The data format of the schema definition. Currently AVRO, JSON and PROTOBUF are supported.

parameters.name: SchemaDefinition
parameters.description: The definition of the schema that has to be validated.

nested_items.name: Valid
nested_items.description: Return true, if the schema is valid and false otherwise.
